meta.title: Performance — Core Web Vitals
meta.description: Real-time performance metrics: LCP, INP, CLS, FCP and TTFB. Core Web Vitals measured during your visit.

hero.title: Site Performance
hero.description: Web Vitals measures the current page in your browser; Lighthouse analyzes the homepage on Google's servers. The same indicators Google uses for ranking.

webVitals.title: Real-time metrics
webVitals.description: Metrics for the current page, captured in your browser during the visit. Some may take a few seconds to appear.
webVitals.lcpDesc: Time until the largest visible element loads. Good: ≤ 2.5s
webVitals.fcpDesc: Time until first content appears. Good: ≤ 1.8s
webVitals.ttfbDesc: Time until first byte from server. Good: ≤ 800ms
webVitals.poweredBy: Data via web-vitals + Vercel Speed Insights
webVitals.tooltipLcp: Time until the largest visible element loads. Affects perceived speed.
webVitals.tooltipInp: Responsiveness to clicks and taps. Lower is smoother.
webVitals.tooltipCls: Visual stability: avoids elements "jumping" while loading.
webVitals.tooltipFcp: Time until the first content appears. First loading impression.
webVitals.tooltipTtfb: Time until the server responds. Affects all following metrics.

lighthouse.title: Lighthouse (last measurement)
lighthouse.description: Current page analysis via Google PageSpeed Insights. Use the selector below for mobile or desktop. 24h cache.
lighthouse.poweredBy: Data via Google PageSpeed Insights API
lighthouse.poweredByFallback: Fallback scores (API not configured or unavailable)
lighthouse.metricsHint: LCP, FCP, TTFB, CLS and TBT appear after refreshing the analysis.
lighthouse.tooltipPerformance: Load speed and smoothness (60 FPS, etc.).
lighthouse.tooltipAccessibility: Best practices for screen readers, contrast, and keyboard navigation.
lighthouse.tooltipBestPractices: HTTPS, images, console without errors, and more.
lighthouse.tooltipSeo: Meta tags, titles, and structure that help search engines.
lighthouse.tooltipLcp: Time until the largest visible element loads (lab).
lighthouse.tooltipFcp: Time until the first content appears (lab).
lighthouse.tooltipTbt: Time the page is blocked and not responsive to interactions.
